Articles.Content:
I just watched the credits.

I never realized it was there and then WHOOSH! It\'s like that stupid prezi but this is 1000% times better.

Just asking, when did they put in a credits?

And it\'s very up-to-date with Mario and the other devs here!

EDIT: I watched more of it and Nova was there!

And C7.
i belive its been there since .13. and it has been updated as well since then.
yep, 0.13 was when it came in. Nova was actually surprised when I told him he was in the credits after watching them in 0.14.1
Yeah, what is NovaSilisko doing in the credits (not that he don\'t deserve that...)? And the\'re nice done .
Nova made the lander legs and the mini engine.

I tried.

Remember KSPWiki that used Java and a console?

Now comes KSPWiki GUI with Swing!

Nova made the lander legs and the mini engine.

Funny thing, he showed me the lander legs before 0.14.0 (the model), I just thought they were going to be in is part pack (well he is a moder after all). I was laughing my head off when I was playing 0.14 for the first time with the landing gear.
